sentences.sContent: The plan was doomed from the start .
sentences.sCn: 这个计划一开始就注定要失败。

synos.tran: 厄运；死亡；判决；世界末日

words.tran: 世界末日；最后的审判日

trans.tranOther: to make someone or something certain to fail, die, be destroyed etc

trans.tranCn: 毁灭； 厄运， 劫数
trans.tranOther: something very bad that is going to happen, or the fact that it is going to happen
